accruePositionInterest().details: Reverts if the sender doesn't have a position

burn(address,bytes).details: Send the amount to burn before calling this functionA callback is invoked on the caller

params.data: The data to be passed through to the callback
params.to: The address to send the unlocked collateral to

params.collateralRequested: The amount of interest to collect
params.to: The address that recieves the collected interest

returns.collateral: The amount of interest that was actually collected

deposit(address,uint256,bytes).details: A callback is invoked on the caller

params.data: The data to be passed through to the callback
params.liquidity: The amount of liquidity shares that will be minted
params.to: The address that will control the position

returns.size: The size of the position that was minted

returns._0: valid True if the invariant is satisfied

lastUpdate().details: don't downsize because it takes up the last slot

mint(address,uint256,bytes).details: A callback is invoked on the caller

params.collateral: The amount of collateral in the position
params.data: The data to be passed through to the callback
params.to: The address that receives the underlying tokens of the liquidity that is withdrawn

returns.shares: The amount of shares that were minted

swap(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: A callback is invoked on the caller

params.data: The data to be passed through to the callback

params.size: The size of the position to be withdrawn
params.to: The address to receive the underlying tokens of the AMM

returns.amount0: The amount of token0 that was withdrawn
returns.amount1: The amount of token1 that was withdrawn
returns.liquidity: The amount of liquidity shares that were withdrawn

accrueInterest().notice: Accrues the global interest by decreasing the total amount of liquidity owed by borrowers and rewarding lenders with the borrowers collateral

accruePositionInterest().notice: Accrues interest for the caller's liquidity position

burn(address,bytes).notice: Burn an option position by minting the required liquidity and unlocking the collateral

collect(address,uint256).notice: Collects the interest that has been gathered to a liquidity position

convertCollateralToLiquidity(uint256).notice: Accounting logic for converting collateral amount to liquidity

convertLiquidityToCollateral(uint256).notice: Accounting logic for converting liquidity to collateral amount

convertLiquidityToShare(uint256).notice: Accounting logic for converting liquidity to share amount

convertShareToLiquidity(uint256).notice: Accounting logic for converting share amount to liqudity

deposit(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Provide liquidity to the underlying AMM

factory().notice: The contract that deployed the lendgine

invariant(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: The implementation of the capped power invariant

lastUpdate().notice: The timestamp at which the interest was last accrued

mint(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Mint an option position by providing token1 as collateral and borrowing the max amount of liquidity

positions(address).notice: Returns information about a position given the controllers address

reserve0().notice: The amount of token0 in the pair

reserve1().notice: The amount of token1 in the pair

rewardPerPositionStored().notice: The amount of token1 rewarded to each unit of position

swap(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Exchange between token0 and token1, either accepts or rejects the proposed trade

token0().notice: The "numeraire" or "base" token in the pair

token0Scale().notice: Scale required to make token 0 18 decimals

token1().notice: The "risky" or "speculative" token in the pair

token1Scale().notice: Scale required to make token 1 18 decimals

totalLiquidity().notice: The total amount of liquidity shares in the pair

totalLiquidityBorrowed().notice: The total amount of liquidity shares borrowed

totalPositionSize().notice: The total amount of positions issued

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw liquidity from the underlying AMM

@notice The total amount of positions issued
@notice The total amount of liquidity shares borrowed
@notice The amount of token1 rewarded to each unit of position

@notice The timestamp at which the interest was last accrued
 @dev don't downsize because it takes up the last slot

@notice Accrues the global interest by decreasing the total amount of liquidity owed by borrowers and rewarding
 lenders with the borrowers collateral

@notice Accrues interest for the caller's liquidity position
 @dev Reverts if the sender doesn't have a position
@notice Accounting logic for converting liquidity to share amount
@notice Accounting logic for converting share amount to liqudity
@notice Accounting logic for converting collateral amount to liquidity
@notice Accounting logic for converting liquidity to collateral amount
